2021 Chicago Cubs Batting Statistics

2020 Season 2022 Season

Record: 71-91-0, Finished 4th in NL_Central (Schedule and Results)

Manager: David Ross (71-91)

President: Jed Hoyer (President, Baseball Operations (team has no GM))

Farm Director: Matt Dorey

Scouting Director: Dan Kantrovitz

Ballpark: Wrigley Field

Attendance: 1,978,934 (5th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 99, Pitching - 100
    One-year: Batting - 103, Pitching - 104

Pythagorean W-L: 68-94, 705 Runs, 839 Runs Allowed
